publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3258 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Bill – Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees that, at Stage 3 of the Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Bill, debate on each part of the proceedings shall be brought to a conclusion at the time specified – Consideration of amendments – no later than 10.15 am Motion to pass the Bill – no later than 10.30 am Supported by: Euan Robson*
